column1:
Overall Sentiment Percentages:
Cleaniness: 59.81%
Amenities: 65.33%
Location: 62.14%
Services: 63.90%
General: 65.46%

Suggestions on How to Improve:
Cleaniness: Focus on regular maintenance and improvements in order to ensure high-quality cleanliness in the area.
Amenities: Increase the number of amenities such as restaurants, retail stores, and recreational facilities.
Location: Develop better public transportation routes in order to make the area more accessible.
Services: Increase staffing levels to provide more efficient and reliable service.
General: Maintain a positive environment by encouraging and enforcing good behaviours such as courtesy and respect.
